=== Current Issues ===
CD/DVD drive doesn't work well with the stock kernel. Kernel image found at the bottom of 
https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/linux/+bug/307829
fixes the issue. Make sure to install the Other package found there too (the Restricted Modules one). Thank you Rafa Berm√∫dez for making it available.
